pr_title: [RW-4589][risk=no] Convert CB wizard to full page

timeline.bodyText: This file is mostly existing code but is showing as new code since I renamed the file. The new code is what I duplicated to use behind the feature flag.
timeline.author: dolbeew

replies.bodyText: This will be converted to react as part of other story ?
replies.author: NehaBroad

replies.bodyText: Yes. I just created a PR for it #3775. That one should probably get merged before this one.
replies.author: dolbeew

timeline.bodyText: This is a copy of ListSearch so we can match the new design without having to have a bunch of if statements to check for the feature flag
timeline.author: dolbeew

timeline.bodyText: We can use FlexWrap here as well
timeline.author: NehaBroad

timeline.bodyText: Optional: We can create a style object for button as its same (as of now)
timeline.author: NehaBroad

timeline.bodyText: Can you please point to the line number for this  condition : ' '?
timeline.author: NehaBroad

replies.bodyText: is it !!searchContext ? if Yes can we just use && ?
replies.author: NehaBroad

replies.bodyText: Yep, that's it. I was thinking render needed to return something but works fine after changing.
replies.author: dolbeew

timeline.message: RW-4589 duplicate modal component, rename root CB component
RW-4589 convert wizard to full page
RW-4589 revert changes to original list-search
